sentences.en: books in which the lives of famous people are dissected
Carefully dissect through the pericardial sack.
I may dissect each little thing and put myself out there too much.
sentences.cn: 可能是我太专注于小事,太投入了.但至少说明我还在乎.

sentences.en: In biology class we had to dissect a frog.
sentences.cn: 上生物课时我们得解剖青蛙.

sentences.en: In spite of this some brave scientists did dissect bodies.
sentences.cn: 尽管如此,一些勇敢的科学家仍坚持解剖人体.

sentences.en: In the biology class today, the teacher showed us how to dissect the endothelium of frogs.
sentences.cn: 今天的生物课上, 老师带领我们解剖了青蛙的内皮.

sentences.en: Not everyone can dissect and digest the public information they receive.
sentences.cn: 不是每个人都可以解析和消化他们得到的公共信息的.

sentences.en: Object: Dissect live fishes to obtain tissue samples from fish brain and liver.
sentences.cn: 目的: 解剖活鱼获得其脑组织与肝组织的样本.

sentences.en: Objective To discuss the relation of dissect variation and iatrogenic biliary duct injury.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨解剖变异与医源性胆道损伤的关系.

sentences.en: Objective: To retrospectively evaluate the necessity to dissect the laryngeal nerve in operation of gland.
sentences.cn: 目的: 通过回顾性分析,评价甲状腺手术中解剖喉返神经的必要性.

sentences.en: People want to dissect his work and question his motives.
sentences.cn: 人们想仔细分析他的作品，并对他的动机提出质疑。

sentences.en: That cell hybridization can be used to dissect regulatory mechanisms controlling gene expression in eukaryotic cells.
sentences.cn: 杂交细胞能被应用于剖析真核细胞中控制基因表现的调节机理.

sentences.en: The blood can dissect up or down the aorta.
sentences.cn: 血液可沿主动脉向上或向下剥离动脉.

sentences.en: The world is going to dissect his response.
sentences.cn: 世界将会剖析他对此次危机做出的回应.
行骨膜下剥离,以减少出血.

sentences.en: To dissect an animal or other organism to study the structure and relation of the parts.
sentences.cn: 为了科学研究而解剖活的动物.

words.tran_cn: 解剖，切开；解剖体；详细查究
解剖；仔细检查（dissect的过去分词）

trans.tran_en: to cut up the body of a dead animal or person in order to study it

trans.tran_cn: 进行解剖，进行详细分析
